main event: A resident of Miami, Florida observed a bright object in the night sky on March 3, 1962.
interesting points: The witness described the object as the size of a silver dollar at arm's length., The object was round, brilliant white with a bluish tint around the edges., It remained stationary for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing., The night was clear with unlimited visibility and no sound was heard., A NICAP investigator found the witness to be reliable and puzzled by what he observed.
sighted object: a bright, round object with a bluish tint
